ZIPI_PORT_DESC: Changing this value will restart Zipi daemon. Default: 7000
ZIPI_URL_DESC: Type this URL in your browser to open Zipi (or just click the Open URL button)
ZIPI_CONF_RESTART_CONFIRM: This will restart Zipi daemon. Proceed?
ZIPI_INVALID_PORT: Port number must be between 1024 and 65353
ZIPI_APP_ERR_PKG_JSON_INVALID: Failed to extract plugin information: package.json is invalid.
ZIPI_APP_ERR_PLUGIN_INFO_INCOMPLETE: Cannot proceed: plugin information is incomplete.
ZIPI_APP_ERR_PKG_JSON_MISSING: Failed to extract plugin information: package.json is missing.
ZIPI_APP_ERR_PLUGIN_VER_INSTALLED: Plugin with the same version is already installed.
ZIPI_APP_CURRENT_UPDATE_TO: Currently installed version will be updated to {}
ZIPI_APP_WARN_VER_COMPARE: Unable to compare version number with currently installed version. You should proceed only if version {0} is newer than {1} (currently installed).
ZIPI_APP_PLUGIN_READY_INSTALL: Plugin is ready to be installed.
ZIPI_APP_CHOOSE_FILE_TO_INSTALL: Choose plugin ZIP file to install, then click Next:
ZIPI_APP_ERR_NO_FILE_CHOSEN: You need to choose a file!
ZIPI_APP_CLOSE_OR_INSTALL_ANOTHER: You may close this page now or install another plugin.
ZIPI_APP_CHECK_LOGS_OR_RETRY: Check the logs below for errors, or click Retry to reattempt installation.
ZIPI_APP_PROMPT_ENABLE_PLUGIN: {} successfully installed. Do you want to enable the plugin now?
ZIPI_APP_PLUGIN_START_FAILED_MSG: {} failed to start. This is usually due to an error in the plugin itself. Please check Volumio logs for related errors messages.
ZIPI_APP_VERIFY_PLUGIN_INFO: Verify that the above information is correct, then click Next to proceed with installation.
ZIPI_APP_INSTALL_WARNING_MSG_1: It is your responsibility to ensure the integrity of the plugin you are about to install. Plugins can contain bugs or malicious code that could damage your system or even surrounding devices. You should always only install from trusted sources.
ZIPI_APP_INSTALL_WARNING_MSG_2: By clicking Proceed, you agree that you shall be solely responsible for any loss or damage that may arise during and after installation of the plugin.
ZIPI_APP_ERR_CHECK_INSTALLABLE_STATUS: Cannot proceed: check Installable Status under Plugin Information.
